mapper.insert: insert into approvaldoc values(AP_DOC_SEQ.nextval, #{apFormNo}, #{apDocWriter}, #{apDocTitle}, #{apDocContent}, '0', 1, sysdate, null)
mapper.select:
select * from (select rownum rn, ap_form_name, ap_doc_no, ap_doc_title, user_name, ap_doc_writer, project_code, project_name, ap_doc_createdate, ap_doc_enddate , ap_doc_status from (select f.ap_form_name, d.ap_doc_no, d.ap_doc_title, u.user_name, d.ap_doc_writer, p.project_code,(select project_name from projects where project_code = p.project_code)as project_name, d.ap_doc_createdate, d.ap_doc_enddate , d.ap_doc_status from approvaldoc d join approvalform f on d.ap_form_no = f.ap_form_no join project_members p on d.ap_doc_writer = p.user_id join users u on p.user_id = u.user_id where ap_doc_writer = #{apDocWriter} and ap_doc_status in (0, 2)
order by ap_doc_status desc, ap_doc_no) where rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} -1) * #{cri.amount}
select Max(ap_doc_no) from approvaldoc where ap_form_no = #{apFormNo} and ap_doc_writer = #{apDocWriter}

select NVL(Max(count(ap_doc_status)),0) from approvaldoc where ap_doc_writer = #{apDocWriter} and ap_doc_status = #{apDocStatus}
group by ap_doc_status
select NVL(count(*),0) from approval a where a.ap_approver = #{apDocWriter} and a.ap_step = (select ap_doc_step from approvaldoc where ap_doc_no = a.ap_doc_no)

select * from (select rownum rn, f.ap_form_name, d.ap_doc_no, d.ap_doc_title, u.user_name, d.ap_doc_writer, p.project_code,(select project_name from projects where project_code = p.project_code)as project_name, d.ap_doc_createdate, d.ap_doc_enddate , d.ap_doc_status from approvaldoc d join approvalform f on d.ap_form_no = f.ap_form_no join project_members p on d.ap_doc_writer = p.user_id join (select user_id, user_name from users) u on p.user_id = u.user_id where d.ap_doc_no in (select a.ap_doc_no from approval a where a.ap_approver = #{apDocWriter} and a.ap_step = (select ap_doc_step from approvaldoc where ap_doc_no = a.ap_doc_no) )and ap_doc_status = 0
and rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} -1) * #{cri.amount}
select d.*, u.user_name as ap_doc_writer_name from approvaldoc d join (select user_id, user_name from users) u on u.user_id = d.ap_doc_writer where d.ap_doc_no = #{apDocNo}
